Even we are apart... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« What it's like to urlLink Love you? To urlLink Love you is to Day Dream of you often, think of you so much , speak of you proudly, and miss you terribly when we are apart. To urlLink Love you is to cherish the warmth of your arms, the sweetness of your kiss, the friendliness of your smile, the loving sound in your voice, and the happiness we share. To urlLink Love you is to never forget the adversity we have overcome, the tears we have shed, the plans we have made, the problems we have solved, and the pain of separation. To urlLink Love you is to remember joyfully the days we made memorable, the moments that will live forever in our hearts, the dreams we hope for, the feelings we have for each other, the caresses and touches of urlLink Love , and the exhilaration of urlLink love that fills our hearts. To urlLink Love you is to need you, want you, hold you, and know you as no one else can. To urlLink Love you is to realize that life without you would be no life at all... That's a little of what it's like to be in urlLink Love with you... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« When I think of my past urlLink love which is you, I may view it as a failure but I tried. And if I find a new urlLink love , I view the past as a teacher. In the game of urlLink love , to me, it doesn't really matter who won or who lost. What is important is I know when to hold on and when to let go… Have I?… I know I really urlLink love someone when I want him to be happy, even if his happiness means that I’m not part of it. Everything happens for the best. If the person I urlLink love doesn't urlLink love me back, I will try not to be afraid to urlLink love someone else again, for I’ll never know unless I give it a try. I’ll never urlLink love a person I urlLink love unless I risk for urlLink love . But the question is… Will I be able to urlLink love that person the way I loved you?… urlLink Love strives in hurting. If I don't get hurt, I don't learn how to urlLink love . urlLink Love doesn't hurt all the urlLink time . Though the hurting is still there to urlLink test me, to help me grow. Don't find urlLink love , let urlLink love find me. That's why it's called falling in urlLink love because I don’t force myself to fall. I just fall… But why you want me to force myself to fall for someone I don’t love?… I cannot finish a book without closing it's chapters. If I want to go on, then I have to leave the past as I turn the pages. urlLink Love is not destroyed by a urlLink single failure or won by a urlLink single caress. It is a lifetime venture in which we are always urlLink learning , discovering and growing. I am… The greatest irony of urlLink love is letting you go when I need to hold on and holding on when I need to let you go. We lose someone we urlLink love only when we are destined to find someone else who can urlLink love us even more than we can urlLink love ourselves. But still, to me, destiny has always been in my hands for me to create a better tomorrow for us… I don’t depend on destiny… I allow destiny to depend on me to create my own hope for a better tomorrow... On falling out of urlLink love , it takes some urlLink time to heal and then I get back on the bus. But I tried not to make the same mistake of boarding the same one that alighted me the first urlLink time . But I did it out of Love… To urlLink love is to risk rejection, to live is to risk dying, to hope is to risk failure. To believe is to risk miracles. But all this risk must be taken because the greatest hazard in life is risk nothing! To reach for you is to risk involvement and commitment, to expose my feelings is to expose my true self towards you which I had and to urlLink love you, is to risk not to be loved in return… How to define love: fall but do not stumble, be constant but not too persistent, share and never be unfair, understanding you and try not to demand, hurt but never keep the pain which I am still trying… urlLink Love is like a knife. It can stab my heart or it can carve wonderful images into my soul that always last for a lifetime. Or in memories of years… urlLink Love is supposed to be the most wonderful feeling. It should inspire me and give me joy and strength. But sometimes the things that gave me joy can also hurt me in the end. Loving you means giving you the freedom who you choose to be and where you choose to be. For all the heartaches and the tears, for gloomy days and fruitless years, I should give thanks, for I know, that there were the things that helped me grow. Loving you means giving you the freedom to find your way and for me to be patient while you are doing your findings.Whether it leads towards me or away from me. urlLink Love is a painful risk to take but the risk must be taken no matter how scary or painful it is to me, for only then I’ll experience the fullness of humanity and that is love… Only urlLink love can hurt my heart, fill me with desire and tear me apart. Only urlLink love can make me cry and only urlLink love knows why. If I’m not ready to cry, if I’m not ready to take the risk, if I’m not ready to feel the pain, then I’m not ready to urlLink love . There was a urlLink time in my life when I became afraid to fall in urlLink love , you gave me the confident to urlLink love and urlLink trust you… I thank you… But now you know why I became afraid to urlLink love before you came and filled my world with love? Coz every urlLink time I do, just like now… I get hurt, then I figured it out… that's why I had to let you go for good… Tough it really hurts to let you go… But do I have a choice? I had… But did you give me one?… Sad to say… No… »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« W hen we're not together... My thoughts drift a alongside memories of you... Because... never mind... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« True Love is being the best of friends - being able to say and share anything while still being sensitive to the other's feelings. True Love is built upon complete trust - complete by knowing that you can never be deceitful or misleading, because to do so would forever cloud the relationship with doubt. True Love is knowing that you'd rather be with this other person than with anyone else, and you feel a sense of emptiness when the two of you are apart... It's when you always think of the future in terms of "we" instead of "me". True Love is treasuring the touch of the other person while feeling a sense of contentment and completeness as you emotinally and physically embrace. True Love is wanting to make the other person happy and fulfilled in every possible way while doing everything you can to prevent their distress... True Love is a commitment to working out the differences that will always come about when two people become one. It is knowing that life will bring pain and sorrow, but together, you will support each other and overcome even the most difficult times. True Love is showing and saying "I LoveYou" even when you both know - through a simple smile - that doing so isn't necessary. True Love is complete within itself, and it lasts into Eternity... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

The gap seems to widen more each month pass and not knowing what I've done... To deserve all this... I get the blame for your problems and can't be there for you... I tried... I'm sorry... Until one fateful day... JR will be a memory left untouched... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

I'm not a perfect person As many things I wish I didn't do But I continue learning I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go Chorus: That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new And the reason is you I'm sorry that I hurt you It's something I must live with everyday And all the pain I put you through I wish that I could take it all away And be the one who catches all your tears Chorus: That's why I need you to hear I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new And the reason is You [x4] I'm not a perfect person I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new And the reason is you I've found a reason to show A side of me you didn't know A reason for all that I do And the reason is you »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« So ng Ded icati on... M is š Y ö u L ik e Cr azy ... Sa ng By: T he Mö ffat ts... I used to call you my girl I used to call you my friend I used to call you the love The love taht I never had When I think of you I don't know what to do When will I see you again Chorus: I miss you like crazy Even more than words can say I miss you like crazy Every minute of every day Girl I'm so down When your love's not around I miss you, miss you, miss you I miss you like crazy You are all that I want You're all that I need Can't you see how I fell Can't you see that my pain's so real When I think of you I don't know what to do When will I see you again Chorus: I miss you like crazy Even more than words can say I miss you like crazy Every minute of every day Girl I'm so downWhen your love's not around I miss you, miss you, miss you I miss you like crazy »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« I don't what I have done... Today you told me that you hated me 5 times... It isn't the first... there were more... I really don't know what I have done... If you hate me just because of the 'emcee' thing, Do you think I wanted to be with you? I tell you... I do... but that was a wish that can never be fulfilled... When the teacher decided to pair us up, I told her to ask you first... Just as I expected... you didn't like it... when the other two selected emcees came to tell me you were not happy about it, Understand... I understand what you were thinking... I did not want to put you in a difficult position and chose to pair up with someone else... Did you know that... No... You didn't turn up for last Friday's rehearsal just because you we were paired up and you didn't give me a chance to tell you that I wasn't pairing up with anymore... Like I said... I t was a wish that can never be fulfilled... And I had to take over all your speeches... I owed you in my past life... That was what I thought... You did not apologies for backing out nor thanked me for taking over your speeches, as expected... But instead, you said you hate me... There are things I have done that you'll never know nor see... Cos you'll never see through it... If I was given a chance to make a wish... This wish is for you... To disappear form your sight forever... Like I never existed... In fact... I never existed in your presence... I was just being used... You admitted you were avoiding me... So as to not causing any more mis understandings... The irony is that when we get in touch, problems rises... when you tried avoiding me... there were also mis understandings... Is this some kind of connection that only we can identify... Is not that I didn't try... I tried not to interfere in your life... So why should I bother... Because it hurts... It hurts to know that you could forget about all the things we did together and how you just left me in lurch... So what have I done for you to hate more... I once told you that you had no rights to hate me as you know what you have done... And to just leave me like that... But now... I surrender... I realized... You can hate me as much as you want because I don't know what I have done to deserve nothing form you but your hate... Your anger was thrown on me... And I can't hate you back... I was not born to Hate... I was born to Love... That's why... And you'll never see through it... Never... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« You've Changed... A Lonely and Broken soul is what I am now... A Lively and Sacastic soul is what you are now... You've Changed... People says Hearts changed... And your's did... You've Changed... Character and Attitude was gracious... But that was before... The real you... Now... Was Goodness... You've Changed... Were you just being a Dope? Being a Dope is one thing... Not realizing or knowing you are being a Dope, Is another thing... Not Learning from what you are being a Dope, Is definitely a different issue... People takes a day to change their Character and Heart... And mine is the Heart that doesn't change... People takes a Life Time to realize that they were being a Dope... But even I know I'm one of them... I choose to be a Dope... What happened... To you and me... And why... There is such a Big change in you now... Do you know it hurts to see you this way... And find myself useless not able to help you in anything... So what if I am always here for you when you don't even realized it... So what if I tried so hard when you don't even see me... You've Changed... Please... (Cries)... "You'll Never See To It..." »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« If you can just turn And walk away... And feel there’s nothing more You need to say... And you do not feel a tearingIn your Heart... If you can so easily... Forget about me... And all the things I tried to be... All the times I tried to hold on... All the things we did and share... Then I guess there was really no reason For you to stay... It hurtsTo see you walk away... For admit it or not... You were an important part of my Life... And the time we shared, Will forever be a part of me... So even though I realizeThat it was never meant to be, Still...It hurts... We visit the World, For only a moment... And that momentIs known as Life... Life of us that is... During this time, We learn about laughter, But also about tears... We find more questions... Than we do answers... We experience the joy... Of new arrivals, And feel the sadness... Of loved ones departures... So we must try... To live every second For than, so quickly Our Moment is gone... But will it come back... For that I still yet to know... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« Today... A friend of mine asked me this question, "If there is a urlLink time machine to bring you back to the past, where do you want to go back to?" I thought for a while and I didn't say anything and this friend of mine said this, "I think you would want to go back when you and him are still together right?" I just nodded my head... Than I again, and told this firned of my that I might want to go back to the past before I knew him so life wouldn't be so empty for me right now... But stil... If I was able to go back to the past, I wish... But is it ever possible... I guess not... I was really happy for my urlLink friends when I came to know that they have found their bus(happiness) but than again... I began to wonder... A friend of mine waited for 9 months for her to board that bus she has always wanted to... ANd it was worth waiting for it... I cried upon recieving the urlLink news froom her... Not only because I was really happy for her... Its also because I really wonder... And since than... Don't know why... I begin to ask myself all the urlLink time ... "Will I be able to wait till that day comes?"... I just wonder... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« Dreams can come true... If you take time to think... About what you want in life... Get to know yourself... Choose your goals carefully... Find out what is important to you... Don't be afraid to make mistakes... Laugh and have a good time... Open yourself up to Love... Live life to the Fullest ... Create your own dreams... And Follow them until they are a Reality ... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« Believe in what makes you feel good... And what makes you happy... Believe in the dreams you've always wanted to come true... And Give them every chance to... No one knows the ultimaye meaning of life, But for those who Believe in their dreams... And themselves... Life is a Precious Gift... In which... Anything Is Possible... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« Everything's going to be okay... Things are going to get better soon... And because you are the Special person you are... I don't think it's going to take very long... I want to give you every bit of Encouragement... I possibly can... Believe in yourself... Because you are really wonderful... And don't forget that beyond the clouds... That sometimes gets in your way... The sun is shining just for you... And Everything is going to be okay... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« In My Heart... You don't have to be perfect to belong in this place... (My Heart) You can climb the highest mountain if you want.... Or quietly imagine that you might someday... You can take chances or take safety nets, Make Miracles or make Mistakes ... You don't have to be composed at all hours to be strong here... (My Heart) You don't have to be bold or certain to be Brave... You don't have to have all the answers, Or even know who you want to be... Just take my Hand... And rest your Heart... And stay awhile with me... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« Hmmm... A little of what Zal and I laways do togehter... We love singing... Especially duet songs... We will sing "A Whole New World" Theme song of Disney's "Aladin"... So call our Favourite... After our break up... I wanted him to listen to this song... "From This Moment" Sang by Shania Twain and Bryan White... At first... the begining part sounded wired to him but I asked him to carry on listening... I started singing as Shania... When it was the guy's part... he was like pretending to sing it... Dot dot dot... Actually... he didn't know the lyrics! Just as I thought... he liked the song... I gave him the lyrics... and the cd... And he did practise it at home I guess... It was actually a song sang Solo by Shania... But she Duet it with Bryan... Though we are apart... We still sing Duet... Though it wasn't a Song I dedicated to him... BUT... There was once... We made a promise and it wasn't supposed to be told to each other... This song... "From This Moment"... Is my Promise to him... J: I do swear that I'll aways be there... I'd give anything and everything and I will always care... Through weakness and strength, Happiness and sorrow, For better or worse, I will love you with every beat of my heart... J: From this moment life has begun R: From this moment you are the one J: Right beside you JR: Is where I belong J: From this moment on R: From this moment I have been blessed J: I live only for your happiness R: And for your love JR: I'd give my last breath J: From this moment onI give my hand to you with all my heart R: Can't wait to live my life with you, Can't wait to start JR: You and I will never be apart My dreams came true because of you J: From this moment as long JR: As I liveI will love you, I promise you this There is nothing I wouldn't give From this moment on J: You're the reason I believe in love R: And you're the answer to my prayers from up above JR: All we need is just the two of us My dreams came true because of you From this moment as long as I liveI will love you, I promise you this There is nothing, I wouldn't give From this moment J: I will love you R: I will love you J: As long as I live JR: From this moment on... Though we may be apart... This... Is my promise i made the other time... From This Moment On... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« It's hard to be apart from you... So many of my thoughts are for you... Each night when the world is quiet and still... Your smile and the wonderful moments We have shared, crowd my mind... Each day, As I go about my routine, You slip gently into my thoughts, And make my smile... Though we can't be together right now... We are together in our Thoughts and Memories... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««

»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ «««««««««««««««««««««««««««« U ntil We're Together Again... I want you to keep me in your heart and in your mind... For I spend so many quiet moments of my own... Thinking how much I miss you, How hard it is to be apart, And how wonderful it is that you're always with me, Warm and Cherished... Here in my Heart ... »»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»»» Jß JªÑ ««««««««««««««««««««««««««««
